scenario_text.value:
What is this place? I’ve never seen anything
like it before!
It’s wonderful!

You think so? It gives me the creeps, to be
honest.

Nobody’s here. There’s no sound from the
crowd.

Still, it is kind of exciting to be in an
amusement park.
You like amusement parks too, Saki?

More like I’ve always liked the idea of
them...
What’s that supposed to mean?
Oh, uh, never mind! Forget I said that.

Isn’t this wild, though? It feels like we
have the whole place to ourselves.

I can almost imagine it as a special event,
like a magical night of mystery or something.

This is a pretty rare experience. And the
run-down parts only add to the charm!
Yeah, I could see that...

But I’m a little worried about you, Saki. Are
you sure you’re not overdoing it?
Wh-why would you think that?

(I mean, I’d think that would be obvious
after how exhausted she was earlier.)

(But I wonder if she’d get mad at me if
I said her enthusiasm was a little too much.)

(She also seems kind of wistful...though
maybe I shouldn’t mention that either.)

(Does that mean the smart thing to do is to
just say I sort of got that impression?)
(What should I say to Saki?)
You’re too excited.
You seem wistful.
No reason.

You seem a little overexcited is all. Like
you’re forcing yourself to be cheerful.
You think I’ve been acting weird, then?
I don’t know if I’d go that far.

But if something’s bothering you, I’d be
happy to hear you out.

Heheh, you’re a real smooth operator, aren’t
you, Takuma?
Huh? Wh-what makes you say that?!
Oh, no reason!

Anyway, don’t worry. It’s nothing you need to
be concerned about.

You’ve just had this wistful look in your
eyes for a while now, so I was concerned.
Oh my god!
Takuma, have you fallen for me that badly?
No! I didn’t mean it like that...
Heheh, I know, I know. I was only kidding.

It’s just nice to be in an amusement park
again, that’s all.

Oh, no reason. I just kinda got that
impression.
You, uh... You did, huh?

(Oh boy... Somehow I get the feeling
I shouldn’t push this any further.)

You know what? Forget it! I’m sure I just got
the wrong idea. Never mind!
Huh?

I mean, after everything we’ve been through
since we came to this world...

...why wouldn’t you get excited about being
in an amusement park?
Takuma...

You know, despite the situation we’re in, I’m
kinda happy to be here too!
Yeah, I think it’s the same for me.
And...thanks for not pushing me for more.
Hm? Did you say something?
No, not a thing!

But what are we doing? We should be looking
for clues to find Miu!

Otherwise Kaito will definitely fly off the
handle again.

We need to find some clues to point us to Miu
before Kaito flies off the handle again.
